  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>00377dbd-a716-4fc8-9539-367c5553ac6b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A víz körforgása a természetben</string>
            <string language="en">The water circulation in nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wasserzirkulation in der Natur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La circulation de l'eau en nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A circulação da água na natureza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La circolazione dell'acqua in natura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κυκλοφορία ύδατος στη φύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La circulación del agua en naturaleza</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A víz körfogását szemléltető rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Water circulation demonstrative illustration</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">anyagforgalom,  víz körforgása,  párolgás,  csapadék,  párologtatás,  ökoszisztéma,  </string>
            <string language="en">traffic is materials, circulation of water, evaporation, precipitation, vaporization, ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserzirkulation demonstrative Abbildung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration démonstrative de circulation de 
l'eau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração demonstrativa da circulação da 
água</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione espansiva di circolazione 
dell'acqua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποδεικτική απεικόνιση κυκλοφορίας ύδατος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración demostrativa de la circulación del 
agua</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehr ist Materialien, Zirkulation des Wassers, 
Verdampfung, Niederschlag, Verdampfung, Oekosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le trafic est les matériaux, circulation de l'eau, 
évaporation, précipitation, vaporisation, écosystème</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o tráfego é os materiais, circulação da água, 
evaporação, precipitação, vaporização, ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il traffico è materiali, circolazione di acqua, 
evaporazione, precipitazione, la vaporizzazione, ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η κυκλοφορία είναι υλικά, κυκλοφορία του ύδατος, εξάτμιση,
πτώση, εξάτμιση, οικοσύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el tráfico es los materiales, circulación del agua, 
evaporación, precipitación, vaporización, ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
